bpm.gateway.core.server.database
Class DataBaseConnection

java.lang.Object
  bpm.gateway.core.GatewayObject
      bpm.gateway.core.server.database.DataBaseConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IServerConnection
public class DataBaseConnection
extends GatewayObject
implements IServerConnection

This class is a standard Class to store JDBC connection information. The driverName field is a key to match to the right JDBC driver java class name

Author:
LCA
